TopicTitle: Does the CLAW have 2- or 3-axis gimbal/rotation

Articles.Content: Simple question, when I free the orientation of the claw, can I rotate it around it's longer axis freely.

Not as far as I know.

Why would you want to?

Not as far as I know.

Why would you want to?

It is possible to create cargo bays and such using the Klaw part.
With respect to the part it is attached to, the claw joint can yaw and pitch, but not roll. (No U-joints. )
It can move in any way apart from outward/inward, and it cannot rotate. No helicopter rotors for you :c
